info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 4:57PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, northwestern Broadwater, northwestern Meagher and northeastern Jefferson Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Helena, or near Helena, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 57 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Helena, East Helena, Montana City, Winston, York, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Black Sandy State Park and Goose Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
